bibl.title: Some Observations on Shenoute's Sources: Who are our Fathers?
bibl.note: The institutional meanings of a group of words (constructions of the Coptic term ⲉⲓⲱⲧ, plural ⲉⲓⲟⲧⲉ ""father, parent"") in the writings of Shenoute.
bibl.seg: Bentley Layton, Some Observations on Shenoute's Sources: Who are our Fathers?
Journal of Coptic Studies 11 (2009) pp. 45-59, 1 tabl., 1 fig.
The institutional meanings of a group of words (constructions of the Coptic term ⲉⲓⲱⲧ, plural ⲉⲓⲟⲧⲉ ""father, parent"") in the writings of Shenoute.
